input_schema.description: A cat photograph to evaluate for intentional framing — whether the composition feels deliberate and positions the cat as the natural focal point of the image.
A cat photograph to evaluate for subject placement and balance — whether the cat's position within the frame feels purposefully chosen and creates visual stability and focus.
A cat photograph to evaluate for effective use of surrounding space — whether the space around the cat serves as a compositional tool that supports the subject without crowding or dwarfing it.
A cat photograph to evaluate for compositional flow toward the subject — whether the visual structure of the image guides the viewer's eye naturally toward the cat.

description: Evaluates how deliberately a cat photograph is composed around its subject, scoring whether the cat's placement, surrounding space, and visual flow work together to present the cat as the focal point — measuring if the frame feels made for the cat, not merely containing it.
